document.full_text: the charlotte airport needs tighter security and more police staffing, a new report concludes, after the death of a teenager who snuck onto the landing gear of a u.s. airways 737 jet last november.
document.title: charlotte airport security faulted after fall from plane
lines_and_colors: the charlotte airport needs tighter security and more police staffing, a new report concludes, after the death of a teenager who snuck onto the landing gear of a u.s. airways 737 jet last november.
